description: Colgate Maximum Cavity Protection Toothpaste in Great Regular Flavour for maximum cavity protection.Strong Inside.Smiles on the Outside.Every day, you are preparing your Family for life, making them stronger from within and this strength is reflected in their smile.We're committed to protecting mouths from cavities - and with a formula that helps add natural calcium* to their teeth, let's keep them smiling strong.Colgate Maximum Cavity Protection Toothpaste is:- Vegan- Sugar free- Gluten free- Responsibly made^Â We've switched to a recyclable tube (does not include cap). Follow local council guidelines for recycling HDPE 2 plastics or recycle with Terracycle.*helps add natural calcium from saliva through fluoride action^to learn more, visit colgatepalmolive.com.au/responsibly-madeSize: 175gFormat: PasteMAXIMUM CAVITY PROTECTION: toothpaste formula helps add natural calcium* to teeth (*from saliva through fluoride action)FORMULA FIGHTS CAVITIES: on teeth surfaces and exposed rootsSTRENGTHENS TEETH: Active fluoride formula, strengthens teethFRESH BREATH: Great regular flavour freshens breathSIZE & FORMAT: Colgate Maximum Cavity Protection toothpaste comes in a 175g toothpaste tube and paste format.
name: Colgate Cavity Protection Great Regular Flavour Toothpaste 175G
